#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sz(c) c.size()
const int SIZE = 1e5+1;
typedef long long int ll;
const ll mod = 1e9+7;
int arr[SIZE];
int n;
int mtp[2000005];


int main(int argc,char const *argv[])
{
   //ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
   //cin.tie(0);
   int tt;
   //cin>>tt;
   scanf("%d",&tt);
   while(tt--)
   {
       int mm=0;
       //cin>>n;
       scanf("%d",&n);
       for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {scanf("%d",&arr[i]);++mtp[arr[i]];if(arr[i]>mm)mm=arr[i];}
        int i;
        for(i=mm;i>=2;i--)
        {
            int cnt=0;
          for(int j=i;j<=mm;j+=i)
          {cnt+=mtp[j];if(cnt>=2)break;}
          if(cnt>=2)
          {
              break;
          }
        }
        printf("%d\n",i);
        for(int i=1;i<=mm;++i)
            mtp[i]=0;
   }
   return 0;
}
